sammyShuckleMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
sammyShuckleMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

sammyShuckleMod:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
sammyShuckleMod:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
sammyShuckleMod:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

sammyShuckleMod:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
sammyShuckleMod:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

sammyShuckleMod:DefaultAttackWithVariabl.NAME: Special Strike
sammyShuckleMod:DefaultAttackWithVariabl.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !sammyShuckleMod:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

sammyShuckleMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumber.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
sammyShuckleMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumber.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !sammyShuckleMod:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

sammyShuckleMod:Toxic.NAME: Toxic
sammyShuckleMod:Toxic.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison. Add a copy of this card to your Discard Pile.

sammyShuckleMod:BugBite.NAME: Bug Bite
sammyShuckleMod:BugBite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If this deals unblocked damage, gain !M! Strength.

sammyShuckleMod:ShellStrike.NAME: Shell Strike
sammyShuckleMod:ShellStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain Block equal to the unblocked damage.

sammyShuckleMod:Infestation.NAME: Infestation
sammyShuckleMod:Infestation.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and NL !sammyShuckleMod:SecondMagic! Vulnerable NL to an enemy.

sammyShuckleMod:Smash.NAME: Smash
sammyShuckleMod:Smash.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Deal !D! damage to all enemies.

sammyShuckleMod:Rollout.NAME: Rollout
sammyShuckleMod:Rollout.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain !M! Strength this turn. NL Put a copy of this card into your hand. NL Exhaust.
